author: Staff Reporter
text:
A youth hailing from a village near Nagercoil and a girl from the Philippines married on Valentine’s Day here.

Love blossomed between them while they were working in a hospital in Saudi Arabia. After two years of relationship, they decided to marry with the consent of their parents on Valentine’s Day in India.

Andrews David (31) of Kunnuvilai near Nagercoil exchanged ring with the Philippines girl Charlin Chandiago (26) at the Booth Tucker Memorial Church in Vetoornimadam on Sunday in the presence of the groom’s parents and their relatives.

Mr. David proposed his love to Ms. Chandiago, a nurse in the same hospital in Saudi Arabia two years ago.

They came to Nagercoil a few days ago. Though the parents of the bride did not come to India, they blessed them over phone immediately after the marriage.
title: Valentine’s Day special: Nagercoil youth marries Philippines girl
